`+e.message;console.error(r),i.textContent=r,i.style.color="red"},u.mount(i),e.insertBefore(i,r),this.domNodes.push(i)}catch(e){console.error(e.message)}}refresh(){return!1}};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"widget"}}}
